text.section: The professional solicitor shall keep the records for at least 3 years after the end of the fund-raising drive, campaign, or event.

section.section: A professional solicitor shall make the records available to the Secretary of State for inspection and copying upon reasonable notice and at any hearing that the Secretary of State holds.

If the records of an organization are maintained outside the State, upon reasonable notice, the organization shall make the records or certified copies of the records available at the Office of the Secretary of State.
